blogPost.excerpt: Recipes are a new way to create step-by-step code walkthroughs right in your ReadMe documentation. By helping you showcase the best use cases for your APIs, it's easy for developers to get started faster while saving your team time on developer support.
blogPost.body: Recipes are a new way to create step-by-step code walkthroughs right in your ReadMe documentation. By helping you showcase the best use cases for your APIs, it's easy for developers to get started faster while saving your team time on developer support.
blogPost.title: ReadMe Recipes - Step-by-step code walkthroughs for your API
blogPost.author: Gregory Koberger

localize.description: Recipes是一种新的方式，可以在您的ReadMe文档中创建分步的代码演练。通过帮助您展示API的最佳用例，开发人员可以轻松上手，同时节省您的团队在开发人员支持上的时间。
localize.tagline: 为您的API提供逐步的代码演练。

localize.description: Recipes是一種新的方式，可以在您的ReadMe文檔中創建分步的代碼演練。通過幫助您展示API的最佳用例，開發人員可以輕鬆上手，同時節省您的團隊在開發人員支持上的時間。
localize.tagline: 爲您的API提供逐步的代碼演練。

previous.excerpt: GoCopy is an AI writing assistant. We augment your creative process with AI-powered writing tools. Say goodbye to writer's block and get your creative juices flowing.
previous.title: GoCopy - Make writing easier with GPT-3

localize.description: GoCopy是一款AI写作助手。我们用AI驱动的写作工具增强您的创作过程。告别写作障碍，让您的创作灵感源源不断。
GoCopy是一款AI寫作助手。我們用AI驅動的寫作工具增強您的創作過程。告別寫作障礙，讓您的創作靈感源源不斷。

next.excerpt: What if programming was about ideas, not semicolons? Compose, abstract, generalise. Start from top down or bottom up and refine as you go. With Nodes, programming feels like sketching on a canvas.
next.title: Nodes - Thinking space for exploring ideas with code

localize.description: 如果编程是关于思想，而不是分号呢？组成、抽象、概括。从自上而下或自下而上开始，边走边完善。有了 Nodes，编程感觉就像在画布上画草图。
localize.tagline: 用代码探索思想的思维空间

localize.description: 如果編程是關於思想，而不是分號呢？組成、抽象、概括。從自上而下或自下而上開始，邊走邊完善。有了 Nodes，編程感覺就像在畫布上畫草圖。
localize.tagline: 用代碼探索思想的思維空間
